title: (x) L'Oreal 70s style fat serif face - Didoni (and alternatives) {Florian}
content:
Hey people-

Wondering if anyone knows this typeface, from the 70's? Correct me if Im wrong...  
Also is there a foundry that has a collection of this era typefaces? Im looking for similar faces also.  
Love it!

Thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130503103656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/70_6054.jpg)
author: J_P_C

comments.content:
Hi Jason,

looks like a wide (or stretched) [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20130503103656/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/didoni/). Alternatively, try [Carousel](http://web.archive.org/web/20130503103656/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/carousel/?sample_text=about&sample_size=96).  
F

Cool thanks!  
Will check it out...

Check the _High Contrast Serifs_ section in this FontFeed post on [Extra Bold, Ultra Black Fonts: Hit Hard with Heavy Duty Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20130503103656/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-bold-ultra-black-fonts/).
Thanks guys, really love the help I receive from this site!
